dialogues.text: Whoa, it's MOMI! The legendary neighborhood watch dog! We're your biggest fans!

choices.text: You should stay inside where it's safe.

dialogues.text: Can we join the Bulldog Squad? Pleeeease? We've been practicing our battle stances!
Aww, but we found something cool! We were playing near the park and saw raccoons sneaking around carrying shiny things!
Okay, okay... but we can still help! We see EVERYTHING from the playground. Like secret agents!
HI-YAH! ...We might need more practice. But we have good eyes! We spot things the grown-ups miss!
Oh! We almost forgot! We saw a HUGE raccoon near the park last night. Bigger than a dog! It went towards the manhole in the sidewalk.
We're the Junior Bulldog Squad! We'll keep watching and report anything suspicious. Go get 'em, Momi!
We know, we know! We just watch from far away. Promise! Go show those raccoons who's boss, Momi!
MOMI'S BACK! Did you beat up any bad guys? We've been keeping score!

choices.text: Keep up the good work, scouts!

dialogues.text: We saw pigeons flying in formation over the rooftops! Like an army! And one of them was wearing a tiny crown... probably.
Aye aye, Captain Momi! Junior Bulldog Squad, reporting for duty!
